name: RELATED_PAT
description: Stores the related patients for a CRM.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RELATED_PAT_ID
columns.description: Stores patients associated with the subject or any of the attachments of a customer service record
